abstract: Former boxing champion Oscar De La Hoya claims he saw Donald J Trump cheat while golfing with him in 2014.
lead_paragraph: The former boxing champion said Trump joined up with his group at Trump National Golf Club in Los Angeles two years ago and cheated twice in the space of two holes.

headline.main: Oscar De La Hoya Says Donald Trump Cheated at Golf

snippet: The former boxing champion said Trump joined up with his group at Trump National Golf Club in Los Angeles two years ago and cheated twice in the space of two holes....
